sentences.en: Declamation is a traditional Chinese teaching method.
sentences.cn: 诵读教学是我国传统的语文教学方法。

sentences.en: Every Saturday night a meeting is held, in which there are oration , declamation , dialogue, and debate.
sentences.cn: 每星期六晚,开会一次, 有演说, 对话, 辩论.

sentences.en: I see that I have lapsed into parable and ecstatic declamation.
sentences.cn: 我知道我在比喻和狂喜的辩论中造成了遗误.

sentences.en: The simplicity of chant, with unison voice and natural declamation, is most common.
sentences.cn: 最普遍的简单吟唱都是合唱和自然的朗诵.

words.tran_cn: 朗读式的；雄辩家式的；慷慨激昂的

trans.tran_cn: <正，贬>慷慨激昂的演说，雄辩 （术）
